title: Desperate search for girl, 3, kidnapped from a birthday party and said to be in 'extreme danger'
text:
An Amber Alert has been issued for three-year-old Kamille 'Cupcake' McKinney

Alabama authorities have issued an Amber Alert for a three-year-old girl who is believed to have been abducted from a birthday party.

Kamille 'Cupcake' McKinney was discovered missing at around 8.30pm Saturday from the Tom Brown Village public housing community in Birmingham.

She is 'believed to be in extreme danger.'

Authorities believe Kamille may have been taken by a man and a woman driving in a dark colored SUV said to be an older model Toyota 4 Runner.

They have been described as a white female and a black male.

The pair's vehicle is said to have rims and a tan protruding bumper.

Kamille has been described as being three-feet-tall and approximately 60lbs.

She was last seen wearing a pink T-shirt with a Minnie Mouse leopard print design on it. Kamille is said to have also been wearing leopard print shorts and had yellow, white and blue bows in her hair.

Shoes were not included in her description.

Anyone with information about the girl's whereabouts is asked to contact the Birmingham Police Department at 205-254-0841.

She was discovered missing at around 8.30pm Saturday from the Tom Brown Village public housing community in Birmingham
description: Kamille 'Cupcake' McKinney was discovered missing at around 8.30pm Saturday from the Tom Brown Village public housing community in Birmingham.
